title: Molecular detection and antibiogram of Shiga toxin-producing Escherichia coli (STEC) from raw milk in and around Bahir Dar town dairy farms, Ethiopia
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Fanuel Bizuayehu Yihunie, Mequanint Addisu Belete, Gizachew Fentahun, Teshager Dubie
